CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Removal_Sub_Status_Selected__c)||ISBLANK(Removal_Sub_Status_Ended__c)) && (Removal_Sub_Status_Ended__c - Removal_Sub_Status_Selected__c) >0, ROUND((Removal_Sub_Status_Ended__c - Removal_Sub_Status_Selected__c)*24,2), IF (NOT(ISBLANK(Removal_Sub_Status_Selected__c)),ROUND(( Now()-Removal_Sub_Status_Selected__c ) * 24, 2), Null))
CustomField.label: Time in Removal Sub-status
